body.name: A Gatherer’s Adventure in Isekai：Sozaisaishuka No Isekairyokouki Vol.１

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🐉 A Very Well-Detailed Isekai Manga! 🧝‍♀️
reviews.reviewText: I usually don’t do reviews on mangas....but for this one, I’ll make an exception! “ A Gather’s Adventure in Isekai” is a very well-detailed, beautifully drawn Isekai manga! I am very impressed with how this manga looked and how the story it told, went! Tomozo and Masuo Kinko, thank you and well done with this manga series so far! I haven’t read volume #2 or #3 yet, but I will soon! Just want to give you a review, since this series doesn’t have a lot of them yet. Readers of my reviews, if you love Isekai and/or fantasy, please give this manga series a chance! I really think you will all love it and enjoy it as I have!FINAL RATING: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Overall it's good
reviews.reviewText: There was quite a bit that was too lackadaisical, but it made up for that in the story and it's future potential. So I thought it was fairly good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars There must be something better
reviews.reviewText: I enjoyed the first book. I will read the rest. But it's not great. The translation feels clunky and the art is average, imho. I wish they at least make these cheaper...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars An excellent take on Isekai
reviews.reviewText: First, the best thing I like about it is Takeru? different ways of doing things (sorry I am not able to spell the MC name well right now).I have read up to the dwarven mine actually to the end of that and I really like this companions and how things were working out for all of them.Also enjoyed the fact that when he got izakided it was more of an administrator thing than a god thing and that he aimed from more things to do like defend and do interesting things explore, create travel then to just kill maim destroy and level up! (Plus he's not tagging along with two children that he asked to raise that are bastards from a demi god that doesn't want to raise them....heheheI hope you enjoy this story also! Try the Great Cleric for another good one.That's one of the things I really like about this story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quite a few typos and blank pages, not sure if they are actually missing or just poorly formatted, at point he is talking with the store guy then is suddenly outside the in with pages blank in between.Also some of the information is in the wrong place or duplicated, like the description for inventory items.Still, better value for money compared to yenpress books which are 50% more expensive and often shorter.Wish they published the matching light novels for these. As fast as I read I tend to finish manga in minutes.

reviews.reviewTitle: I’m kind of reserved on this isekai manga
reviews.reviewText: I usually love isekai light novels and manga.This one is quite good, pretty well-detailed and all. The MC is an OP character as you can expect from this kind of isekai. I enjoyed the fact the MC tested his skills and get adapted to them.At first, I’ve got some difficulty to get into the story, maybe because there were so few scenes where you can get to know the MC, his personality…The art is quite good, even if some character postures seem a bit off…Overall, I’m a bit reserved but this manga has potential so I will read the #2.
